title: Good Friday And Doctors Disagree | Daily Best of April 15 | Rick & Bubba
description:
It's Good Friday and we take time to worship and observe the greatest story ever told. In COVID news, we hear from two doctors with vastly differing opinions. Joe Biden shakes an invisible hand. Elon Musk gets pushback in his attempt to own Twitter. And Greg makes a huge mess in the break room.
